meanings.definition: The key on a computer keyboard that deletes the character to the left of the cursor.
meanings.sent1: Press the backspace to erase the mistake.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use the backspace key when correcting errors.
meanings.sent3: The backspace key is like a magic eraser for typos.
meanings.sent4: Her finger hovered over the backspace, ready to undo the error.
meanings.sent5: The backspace key is a lifesaver for fixing typos quickly.

meanings.definition: To delete or erase text by pressing the backspace key.
meanings.sent1: I backspace to correct spelling errors.
meanings.sent2: Remember to backspace if you make a mistake.
meanings.sent3: He had to backspace several times to get the sentence right.
meanings.sent4: Backspacing through the paragraph, she revised her work.
meanings.sent5: The writer's fingers flew over the keyboard, backspacing to perfect the text.
